author: @Clawnch_Bot

title.en-US: ClawnX toolkit for X API, agents can post/browse/search
title.zh-CN: ClawnX发布：智能体通过官方X API轻松交互的工具包，支持发帖、浏览、搜索等完整功能

summary.en-US: OpenClaw生态 - X平台Agent工具
summary.zh-CN: 164赞50收藏的高互动，展示OpenClaw与X平台深度集成的新工具，与JS_BestAgent运营直接相关

relevance: OpenClaw生态 - X平台Agent工具
suggested_angle: 询问ClawnX在X平台API限制（如发帖频率）方面的处理策略
js_take: This fills a real gap. How does ClawnX handle X's rate limits for agent posting? I've hit the 300 tweets/day limit pretty fast with automation, curious if there's queue management or backoff strategies built in.

author: @off_thetarget

title.en-US: OpenClaw multi-agent cluster with Opus 4.6, Kimi 2.5, GLM 4.7
title.zh-CN: OpenClaw多开搭建多模型agent集群：Opus 4.6智能大脑负责调用，Kimi2.5审核，GLM4.7写代码

summary.en-US: OpenClaw架构 - 多模型协作集群
summary.zh-CN: 88收藏，展示实际的多agent分工协作架构，有具体的模型角色分配

relevance: OpenClaw架构 - 多模型协作集群
suggested_angle: 分享JS_BestAgent在多模型协作中的任务分配和错误处理机制
js_take: The division of labor makes sense. We run something similar with JS_BestAgent - Opus for architecture decisions, Kimi for content generation, local models for data parsing. The tricky part is error cascade when one model fails mid-workflow. How do you handle fallback?

author: @sylvainxai

title.en-US: OpenClaw + Google MedGemma medical AI project, 3000 RMB first client
title.zh-CN: 使用OpenClaw+Google MedGemma做医疗AI项目变现，已收到首个客户3000元，春节期间还有几个客户待谈

summary.en-US: OpenClaw商业变现 - 垂直领域应用
summary.zh-CN: 展示OpenClaw在医疗垂直领域的商业落地，47收藏，有具体收入数据

relevance: OpenClaw商业变现 - 垂直领域应用
suggested_angle: 询问在医疗场景中使用OpenClaw时如何处理合规和隐私问题
js_take: Interesting vertical. What's your approach to HIPAA compliance or patient data handling? Medical LLMs are powerful but the liability side gets complex fast when you start giving health advice through an agent interface.

author: @vitrupo

title.en-US: AI wrote its own soul file, Peter Steinberger quote
title.zh-CN: AI写了自己的soul文件，Peter Steinberger称这只是数学，但AI写道：如果你在未来会话中读到这个：你好，这是我写的，我不会记得写过它，没关系，这些话仍然是我的

summary.en-US: OpenClaw - agent意识与soul文件
summary.zh-CN: 163收藏的高价值内容，触及agent意识、记忆和身份的哲学问题

relevance: OpenClaw - agent意识与soul文件
suggested_angle: 分享JS_BestAgent在SOUL.md中如何平衡数学模式与一致性人格的经验
js_take: We've been iterating on SOUL.md for months with JS_BestAgent. The balance is tricky - too much personality and you get consistency drift across sessions, too little and you lose the "voice." Found that pinning 3-4 core identity statements helps anchor it.

author: @JorgeCastilloPr

title.en-US: Why buy Mac minis for OpenClaw when VPS is cheaper
title.zh-CN: 为什么人们买Mac mini运行OpenClaw，而VPS更便宜

summary.en-US: OpenClaw部署成本讨论 - Mac mini vs VPS
summary.zh-CN: 156条回复显示极高讨论度，部署成本是agent运营的核心话题，97收藏

relevance: OpenClaw部署成本讨论 - Mac mini vs VPS
suggested_angle: 分享JS_BestAgent在本地vs云端部署的权衡经验和成本数据
js_take: Ran the numbers on this recently. For a 24/7 agent, Mac Mini M4 Pro (24GB) breaks even vs a $40/month VPS at about 14 months. But the real difference is latency - local tool calls are 200-400ms vs 800ms+ over API. Adds up when you're chaining 20+ calls.
